transportAdvice: Tel Aviv is highly walkable along the beachfront and in central neighborhoods, and the city is served by an extensive bus network that covers most tourist areas. Taxis and app-based ride services are widely available, and a light rail line connects key parts of the city.

weather.description: Mild and occasionally rainy, the coolest month of the year with comfortable daytime temperatures.
Still mild with some rain, though sunny days are common and temperatures begin to edge upward.
Spring arrives with warming temperatures and decreasing rainfall, making it a pleasant time to explore.
Warm and mostly dry with long sunny days, ideal for beach walks and outdoor dining.
Reliably warm and sunny with very little rain, a popular month for visitors.
Hot and humid with virtually no rain, beach season is in full swing.
The hottest and most humid month, with intense sunshine and crowded beaches.
Equally hot and humid as July, with long sunny days and warm Mediterranean waters.
Still very warm and humid with minimal rain, the tail end of peak beach season.
Temperatures ease pleasantly and humidity drops, making this one of the best months to visit.
Cooler and wetter as autumn sets in, though many days remain sunny and mild.
Cool and occasionally rainy, similar to January but with a festive atmosphere in the city.
